routers package

accessories_controller module

Accessories Controller Module

This module defines the FastAPI routes for accessory-related operations. It provides endpoints to retrieve all accessories or a specific accessory by its ID.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Define routes for accessory-related API operations.

  • Handle exceptions and return appropriate HTTP responses.

async src.routers.accessories_controller.get_accessories(limit=fastapi.Query, customer_database=fastapi.Depends)

Retrieves a list of accessories from the database.

Parameters:

  • limit (int | None) – The maximum number of accessories to retrieve (optional).

  • customer_database (Database) – The database connection dependency.

Returns:

A list of accessories as AccessoryReturnResource.

Return type:

List[AccessoryReturnResource]

async src.routers.accessories_controller.get_accessory(accessory_id=fastapi.Path, customer_database=fastapi.Depends)

Retrieves a specific accessory by its UUID.

Parameters:

  • accessory_id (UUID) – The UUID of the accessory to retrieve.

  • customer_database (Database) – The database connection dependency.

Returns:

The accessory as an AccessoryReturnResource.

Return type:

AccessoryReturnResource

src.routers.accessories_controller.get_db()

brands_controller module

Brands Controller Module

This module defines the FastAPI routes for brand-related operations. It provides endpoints to retrieve all brands or a specific brand by its ID.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Define routes for brand-related API operations.

  • Handle exceptions and return appropriate HTTP responses.

async src.routers.brands_controller.get_brand(brand_id=fastapi.Path, customer_database=fastapi.Depends)

Retrieves a specific car brand by its UUID.

Parameters:

  • brand_id (UUID) – The UUID of the brand to retrieve.

  • customer_database (Database) – The database connection dependency.

Returns:

The brand as a BrandReturnResource.

Return type:

BrandReturnResource

async src.routers.brands_controller.get_brands(limit=fastapi.Query, customer_database=fastapi.Depends)

Retrieves a list of car brands from the database.

  • limit (int | None) – The maximum number of brands to retrieve (optional).

  • customer_database (Database) – The database connection dependency.

Returns:

A list of brands as BrandReturnResource.

List[BrandReturnResource]

  • Handle exceptions and return appropriate HTTP responses.

models_controller module

Models Controller Module

This module defines the FastAPI routes for model-related operations. It provides endpoints to retrieve all car models or a specific car model by its ID.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Define routes for car model-related API operations.

  • Handle exceptions and return appropriate HTTP responses.

src.routers.models_controller.get_db()
async src.routers.models_controller.get_model(model_id=fastapi.Path, customer_database=fastapi.Depends)

Retrieves a specific car model by its UUID.

Parameters:

  • model_id (UUID) – The UUID of the car model to retrieve.

  • customer_database (Database) – The database connection dependency.

Returns:

The model as a ModelReturnResource.

Return type:

ModelReturnResource

async src.routers.models_controller.get_models(brand_id=fastapi.Query, limit=fastapi.Query, customer_database=fastapi.Depends)

Retrieves a list of car models from the database.

Parameters:

  • brand_id (UUID | None) – The UUID of the brand to filter models by (optional).

  • limit (int | None) – The maximum number of car models to retrieve (optional).

  • customer_database (Database) – The database connection dependency.

Returns:

A list of models as ModelReturnResource.

Return type:

List[ModelReturnResource]
